HotelElement.Name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Downtown/Bayside

Description.Text: We're situated just two blocks from the San Diego Bay and San Diego International Airport and less than two miles from downtown San Diego, San Diego Convention Center and the Gaslamp Quarter. You'll be a short walk to the harbor, a few blocks from businesses and just steps from restaurants and shopping. Business travelers will appreciate the proximity of our San Diego downtown hotel to Solar Turbines, a Caterpillar Company, Toyota, Titan Corp, San Diego Courthouse and Lockheed Martin. All this and more things to do near San Diego are just steps from the Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Downtown/Bayside and Hilton Garden Inn San Diego Downtown/Bayside.
